verbose_text: Confocal immunofluorescence analysis for the expression of various transcription factors (EMT-TFs) known to control the EMT process indicated that the expression of the epithelial marker E-cadherin was downregulated in hTERT high CSCs, whereas E-cadherin was upregulated in hTERT -/low CSCs.
evidence: expression of the epithelial marker E-cadherin
